Mothership DAO

A stake in a sustainable future

Read More

Mothership DAO is dedicated to providing safe, productive spaces for community members to grow and prosper, using a user-centric, privacy-by-design approach. Mothership supports artists, musicians and other creative talent as they fly in the metaverse and live in the meatspace.
